Key Arguments: The legislation is seen as an assault on freedom of speech.
The proposal is compared to George Orwell's 'Ministry of Truth', implying it would lead to censorship.
The government should not have the power to decide what is true or false, as it constitutes government overreach.
The legislation could suppress individual opinions that disagree with the government.
